1. Message from the Mayor

Message from the Mayor
======================

Welcome to our website. This website is designed to keep the citizens and visitors of Monahans up to date on important information about city meetings and services. You will also find information on the city budget, the monthly check register, and our financial reports. Whether you are one of our valued residents or you are visiting, we are here to provide you with all the tools you need to keep you informed. We look forward to serving you, our friends, our neighbors, and our community. Monahans was founded in 1881 and was later incorporated in 1928. The city operates under the Council-Manager form of government. This system combines the strength of an elected mayor and city council with a professional city manager and staff that is constantly working to improve our town. With unified leaders and citizens who are committed to having a community that maintains a low crime rate, the lowest taxes around, and a community that will withstand the test of time.

A Note From Our Mayor
---------------------

On behalf of the citizens of Monahans, I am pleased to welcome you to OUR city. I am humbled and honored to serve as Mayor of the City of Monahans. Monahans is very fortunate to have a dedicated City Council and City Staff. Together as a team, we continually
. The City of Monahans is the "Center of the Permian Basin" in West Texas. We have plenty of housing options with a great mix of well-established neighborhoods and new home development. Our schools are newly renovated, and a new school is nearing completion in Fall 2021. For outdoor activities, we have an 18-hole golf course and numerous parks to include a swimming pool and Sandhills State Park for families to enjoy. The well-being of our citizens is always at the forefront as we want to ensure that the City of Monahans continues to be a great place to live, work, raise a family, and grow a business!

**Adam Steen**
